name: Football Match 3 Blitz
description:
Football Match 3 Blitz is a fun football themed match three puzzle game. This is the perfect game for football fans everywhere. The goal of the game is to get as many touchdowns and yards as possible because they are multiplied together for your score. Touch an item and swipe up, down, left or right to move it. Match three or more of the same type to try and get yards to move the ball downfield. The pass and run tiles give you positive yards. The defensive tile will give you negative yards and the penalty tile can either be positive or negative yards. The more tiles you match in a row or column gives you the potential for more yards.

+ Score touchdowns
+ Five minute games
+ Offensive plays
+ Defensive plays
+ Offensive penalties
+ Defensive penalties
+ Fun football theme
+ Play to get high score
+ Fun for all ages
